channel.title: Error connecting to server? (not a stupid question..)
channel.description: I've had my own server for about 2 weeks now and for some strange reason I came home today and the server was still running.. as usual... however when I tried to log into my server, it said 'error connecting to server' So I closed the runserver cmd thingy and relaunched it, but it still gave me a 'error connecting to server' problem and it is happening to all of my players. Its been working perfectly fine for two weeks, dont know whyit just stopped... I am using SilabSoft client btw. thanks in advance. Ps. Yes I did search but it was all a bunch of newbs, and none of them even got help..

item.title: Error connecting to server? (not a stupid question..)
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

why is it working for some servers but not mine? thats fucking gay!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2008, 12:27:06 PM[/size][hr]bump - its still not working however it is working for everyone else!

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server? (not a stupid question..)
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

  1. Try to use regular Moparscape.org to log into
  2. Make sure the ip is 127.0.0.1 for you.
  3. Tell me if it works.

item.title: Error connecting to server? (not a stupid question..)
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

I’ve had my own server for about 2 weeks now and for some strange reason I came home today and the server was still running… as usual… however when I tried to log into my server, it said ‘error connecting to server’
So I closed the runserver cmd thingy and relaunched it, but it still gave me a ‘error connecting to server’ problem and it is happening to all of my players.
Its been working perfectly fine for two weeks, dont know whyit just stopped… I am using SilabSoft client btw.
thanks in advance.
Ps. Yes I did search but it was all a bunch of newbs, and none of them even got help…
